caption.p: Supplemental Table 1: the 222 components with target records for the four main Chinese medicinal herbs. Supplemental Table 2: the component-target pairs for the important components as screened by ADME. Supplemental Table 3: enriched GO functional terms for the 27 target genes. Supplemental Table 4: enriched KEGG pathways for the 27 target genes.
